name: blue.vim
description: A syntax file for the blue programming language.
install_details:
1. Copy the file to ~/.vim/syntax
2. Add the following line to your ~/.vimrc
au BufRead,BufNewFile *.bl set filetype=blue
3. Reopen Vim or type :source ~/.vimrc to reload the configuration.

versions.release_notes: Added del, global and lexical keywords
